name: Ed's Diner
description:
An alternative control puzzle game. where you must exercise all the ghosts before time runs out or else the diner will be haunted FOREVER... compete to complete the game with the least amount of switches flicked. Eds Diner was made for Sheridan Colleges Sprint Week a four day game jam with the theme alternative controllers

This is still a WIP the buttons were mapped for an alternative controller so it still needs to be remapped to a keyboard for the players to have the best experience
